page.title: 01OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK
page.content: We are lucky to live in our habitat. The scenery is varied. The centre of {Rawmarsh}is residential and it gets less residential as it stretches out to the boundaries of our area. It is mostly countryside near the boundaries but some of the land near our boundaries is residential. The unemployment is great. Many people have no jobs but could do well in the works we used to have, like coal mining and steel industries. Many coal mines have run out of coal, and steel is being imported from foreign countries because it is much cheaper to make there. There are some factories moving to our area, which are new, modern ones. {The British {Waterways Board}has restored the{South Yorkshire Navigation}that runs through{Swinton and Rotherham}and we hope it will help new industries.
